text: Smite is a free to play multiplayer video game made by Hi-Rez Studios. It can be played on Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox One.SMITE arriving soon on the Xbox One | Hi-Rez Studios, Inc . Hirezstudios.com (August 12, 2014).
